DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety of Nevanac 0.1% compared to Acular LS 0.4% and Vehicle in patients treated before cataract surgery and for approximately 90 days following surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Nevanac 3-Month Safety Study With QID Dosing
DOC.criteria: Patients of any race or sex ages 10 years or older undergoing cataract extraction with planned implantation of a posterior chamber intraocular lens. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Under 10 Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
